name: v0.5.6
body:
- Workaround for UnicodeDecodeError issue: #144, #155
- Fixed table parsing (small images as dashed borders) issue: #138, #158
- Improved table parsing (allow one-cell-table with shading): #149

name: v0.5.5
body: - fixed closePath issue for PyMuPDF 1.20+: #146, #147

name: v0.5.4
body:
- Ignore hidden text #132 
- Fixed property name deprecated by PyMuPDF 1.20+ #139, #141, #143

name: v0.5.3
body:
- section parsing enhancement
- table parsing enhancement: #105, #107
- vector graphic parsing enhancement: recursive xy cut
- upgrade with PyMuPDF>=1.19.0
- supported Python 3.10
- fixed images parsing issues: #110, #125, #123
- fixed importing GUI issue for non-GUI platform: #118, #121

name: v0.5.2
body:
- new layout structure: Page -> **Section** -> **Column** -> blocks
- extended parsing scope: document -> page -> section
- corrected font name with font-tools
- changed from exact line spacing to relative line spacing
- supported encrypted pdf #86
- added user interface #88

name: v0.5.1
body:
- support hyperlink #59 
- create [API documentation](https://dothinking.github.io/pdf2docx/index.html)
- enhancement: parse page layout recursively

name: v0.5.0
body:
- extract pdf path with `PyMuPDF` (>=1.18.0) API
- support floating picture
- enhance paragraph alignment and vertical spacing
- global settings on page parsing
- enhance CLI commands

name: v0.4.6
body:
- enhance parsing stream table, e.g. consider explicit shading when construct stream table
- enhance parsing lattice table, e.g. consider stream border deep into cell when parsing lattice table, detect semantic type of stroke/fill shapes in advance
- enhance text alignment detection
- fixed issue on vector graphics criterion
- switch to pytest and integrate code coverage result

name: v0.4.5
body:
fixed reproducing images issue:

- images in CMYK color-space
- transparent images

name: v0.4.4
body: detect vector graphic and convert to bitmap

name: v0.4.3
body: support paragraph alignment

name: v0.4.2
body:
- correct block bbox due to unnamed font in PDF
- set borders style for each cell

name: v0.4.1
body:
- align stream table borders
- consider explicit border in stream table
- consider page rotation
- parsing pages with multi-processing

name: v0.4.0
body: new feature: nested table (support 1 layer only)

name: v0.3.5
body:
enhancement: text format parsing

- consider text shading instead if out of default highlight colors
- font name localization: Chinese
- do not adjust spacing between Chinese and Latin/number

name: v0.3.4
body: fixed issue: operator name conflicts with text when extracting path

name: v0.3.3
body:
- extract annotations over multi-lines precisely
- fix docx.image.exceptions.UnrecognizedImageError
- set font size precisely by setting character scaling
- CS transformation between PDF and `PyMuPDF`
- consider cell shading for implicit table
- fixed issue on empty page, text style

name: v0.3.2
body: parse and recreate text blocks in vertical direction

name: v0.3.1
body: simplify process: merge image block into text block

name: v0.3.0
body: Refactoring: OOP

name: v0.2.0
body:
- improved parsing explicit table
- fixed duplicated text format issue

name: v0.1.0
body: new feature: extract table content

name: v0.0.1
body: first release
